TextEng: Disgruntled Nobleman
Text: 불만 가득한 귀족

TextEng: Villain, why are you here? This is private property!
Text: 악당, 왜 여기에 있나? 여긴 사유지다!

TextEng: Why are you in my home? What business do you have here? None lawful, I'll wager.
Text: 왜 내 집에 들어왔지? 무슨 용무로? 합법적인 일은 아닐 테지.

TextEng: The sheer nerve! Why have you come into my home, <sir/madam>?
Text: 감히 어디서! 내 집에 왜 들어왔나, 선생?

TextEng: Get out of here, before I call the watch on you!
Text: 썩 꺼져! 경비대를 부르기 전에!

TextEng: I suppose that makes you a burglar of some sort? Come to rob me, have you?
Text: 그렇다면 너는 좀도둑쯤 되겠군? 날 털러 왔나?

TextEng: I thought so. Fine, take your bloody gold and get out! I don't have time to be listening to your evil posturing. Take it and go!
Text: 그럴 줄 알았다. 좋아, 이 빌어먹을 금화를 가져가고 꺼져! 네 악랄한 으름장 따위 들을 시간 없어. 가져가고 나가!

TextEng: And don't return! Animal! Dog!
Text: 그리고 다시는 오지 마! 짐승 같으니! 개 같은!

TextEng: What is this? Another lout pushing through my home? Well, let me save you some time. If you were going to rob me, someone already beat you to it!
Text: 뭐야? 또 다른 건달이 내 집을 헤집고 다니는 건가? 시간을 아껴 주지. 털 생각이면 이미 누가 먼저 털고 갔어!

TextEng: So state whatever your other business is and then get out. I've nothing more to take!
Text: 그러니 다른 볼일이 있으면 말하고 꺼져. 더 이상 가져갈 것도 없어!

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> I don't trust the look of you, villain! Just because there's a plague, you think you can walk in anywhere? Get out this instant!
Text: <StartCheck>[실패]</Start> 꼴이 영 수상하군, 악당! 역병이라고 해서 아무 집이나 들락거릴 수 있는 줄 아나? 당장 나가!

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> Oh. I suppose you don't look like such a bad sort. You just startled me by barging in here uninvited, is all.
Text: <StartCheck>[성공]</Start> 흠... 그렇게 나쁜 사람처럼 보이진 않는군. 초대도 없이 들이닥쳐서 놀랐을 뿐이야.

TextEng: What was it you wanted, then, <sir/madam>?
Text: 그래서, 뭘 원하나, 선생?

TextEng: Ruffians back again, hmm? Something you need?
Text: 또 깡패들이로군, 흠? 필요한 게 있나?

TextEng: Yes, leave me be.
Text: 그래, 이만 가 보게.

TextEng: I'm sure you know the way out.
Text: 나가는 길은 알겠지.

TextEng: Fare you well, <sir/madam>.
Text: 안녕히 가시오, 선생.

TextEng: If you must. I will make no promises that I will answer, though.
Text: 그러시든지. 하지만 대답해 준다고 약속하진 않겠네.

TextEng: Very well, but keep your distance. I don't recognize you, so you likely slipped past the barricade and may have brought the plague with you.
Text: 좋아, 하지만 거리 둬. 난 자넬 모르니, 방어벽을 몰래 넘어온 자일지도 모르고 역병을 데려왔을지도 모르니까.

TextEng: Well... make it quick, if you will. I do have things I should be attending to.
Text: 그럼... 빨리 끝내주게. 내가 볼일이 많아서 말이야.

TextEng: You don't say? Nobles dying in (gulp) their own homes? Hypothetically, would you mean nobles like me... in my home?
Text: 정말인가? 귀족들이 (꿀꺽) 자기 집에서 죽는다니? 가령, 나 같은 귀족... 이 집에서?

TextEng: All right then. Whatever you were up to, I don't want to see you back.
Text: 좋아. 무슨 짓이든, 다시는 돌아오지 마.

TextEng: Very well... but make it quick. I'm not sure what you are up to...
Text: 좋아... 하지만 빨리 말해. 자네가 무슨 수작을 부리는지 모르겠군...

TextEng: I understand. Take your damn gold and get out. Out! Criminal! Dog!
Text: 알겠다. 이 더러운 금화를 가져가고 꺼져라. 나가! 범죄자! 개 같은 것!

TextEng: Stop right there! I've already given out the last of my gold and there isn't any more! Now, ask your questions and get out!
Text: 거기 서라! 줄 금은 이미 마지막까지 내줬어, 더는 없어! 자, 물을 거면 묻고 꺼져!

TextEng: As you will. Make your questions short, I cannot bear your halting speech.
Text: 좋을 대로. 질문은 짧게 해. 더듬거리는 말투는 못 견디겠으니.

TextEng: What were you looking for, then?
Text: 그래서, 뭘 찾고 있었나?

TextEng: Unless you are asking for the way out of my home, I doubt I can help you.
Text: 내 집에서 나가는 길을 묻는 게 아니라면, 내가 도울 일은 없을 걸세.

TextEng: I imagine they sell supplies at the Board Laid Bare, but I have not been there myself. It is by the south gate.
Text: 물자는 적나라한 게시판 선술집에서 판다고 들었네만, 나 스스로 가 본 적은 없지. 남문 근처에 있어.

TextEng: We have no such establishment. Those that need such a place used to travel to the City Core.
Text: 여긴 그런 시설 없다. 그런 게 필요하면 시가지 중심지로 가곤 했지.

TextEng: The Board Laid Bare, I believe. A tavern mostly. I can't tell you any more. Not my sort of place. It is by the south gate.
Text: 적나라한 게시판일 걸세. 주로 선술집이지. 더는 모른다네. 내 취향이 아니거든. 남문 근처에 있어.

TextEng: Is there something else?
Text: 또 필요한가?

TextEng: I'm certain that I am above anything you would consider "interesting."
Text: 자네가 '흥미롭다'고 여길 만한 것 따위와 나는 거리가 멀지.

TextEng: I don't know. That tavern, the Board Laid Bare? It has quite a scandalous reputation, I hear.
Text: 모르겠군. 그 선술집, 적나라한 게시판 선술집 말인가? 제법 악평이 자자하다고 들었지.

TextEng: I have no information on employment. I have people for that.
Text: 일자리 따위엔 관심 없어. 그건 내 사람들이 알아서 한다.

TextEng: Well, that girl Formosa is looking for people who will listen to her. She's down in the southeast square trying to stir up folks against Meldanen.
Text: 그나저나, 포르모사라는 아가씨가 자기 말을 들어줄 사람을 찾고 있더군. 남동쪽 광장에서 멜다넨을 헐뜯으며 선동 중이지.

TextEng: I don't pay attention to troublemakers like her. Everyone should be left to their own affairs. Whatever Meldanen is up to, it's no business of hers or mine.
Text: 그런 소란꾼에게 신경 쓰지 않아. 사람은 각자 일에나 신경 써야지. 멜다넨이 뭘 하든, 그건 그녀도 나도 상관할 바 아니야.

TextEng: Is there something else you wanted to know?
Text: 다른 게 더 궁금한가?

TextEng: Mmm, nothing comes to mind. At least, nothing now that Formosa and Meldanen are no longer at each other's throats.
Text: 흠, 딱히 떠오르는 건 없군. 포르모사와 멜다넨이 서로 으르렁거리던 것도 이제 끝났으니.

TextEng: Lord Meldanen has been stirring up trouble, but I do not wish to speak of it.
Text: 멜다넨 경이 말썽을 일으킨 건 맞지만, 더 말하고 싶지 않군.

TextEng: Er... No, I don't think I shall go into the subject in detail. I don't find your manner... eh... entreating. Besides, Meldanen is a dangerous man to gossip about.
Text: 음... 아니, 자세한 얘기는 꺼내지 않겠네. 자네 태도가 영 내키지 않아. 게다가 멜다넨에 대해 떠벌리다간 위험하거든.

TextEng: Well now, I wouldn't mind spending a few more moments in your delightful company. Lean in close, now. From what I've heard, Meldanen recently accquired a young woman for his amusement.
Text: 흠, 자네 정도면 잠시 더 상대해 줘도 되겠지. 이리 가까이. 들리는 말로는 멜다넨이 최근에 자기 흥미를 위해 젊은 여자를 들여왔다더군.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> I don't spread rumors. Besides, Meldanen is not known for his patience or gentle business acumen. I do not wish to be on his bad side.
Text: <StartCheck>[실패]</Start> 소문을 퍼뜨릴 생각은 없네. 게다가 멜다넨은 인내도, 온건한 장사수완도 모르는 인물이지. 그와 틀어지고 싶지 않다네.

TextEng: His mansion is in the northwest part of the district if you wish to visit him yourself. I would advise against it, however.
Text: 직접 찾아갈 셈이면 저택은 지구 북서쪽에 있지. 다만 말리겠네.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> I suppose there's no way for the wizard to know, is there? Well... word is that Meldanen recently accquired a young woman for his amusement.
Text: <StartCheck>[성공]</Start> 그 마법사가 알 길은 없겠지, 그렇지? ...그래, 들리는 말로는 멜다넨이 최근 자신의 흥미를 위해 젊은 여자를 들였다고 하더군.

TextEng: He won't let her out, and the rumors say that she's rather strange...perhaps not quite human. The gods only know what he wants with her. Rather sordid business, no?
Text: 그녀를 밖으로 내보내지도 않고, 소문으론 좀 수상한 처자라네... 완전히 인간은 아닐지도. 신들만이 그의 의도를 알겠지. 꽤 추잡한 일이야, 안 그런가?

TextEng: At any rate, if you want you can see for yourself. Meldanen's estate is in the northwest. I wouldn't advise going there, though...he won't see you.
Text: 어쨌든 직접 확인하고 싶다면 북서쪽 멜다넨 영지로 가 보게. 추천하진 않지만... 자네를 만나 주지도 않을 걸세.

TextEng: Nothing. Well, there was some sort of affair with Lord Meldanen, but it has apparently been resolved. I assume it was some sort of scandal.
Text: 없어. 뭐, 멜다넨 경과 무슨 소동이 있긴 했지만, 이미 수습된 듯하네. 아마 한바탕 스캔들이었겠지.

TextEng: I heard he was hoarding food or some such, but all is quiet now.
Text: 식량을 비축했다느니 어쩌니 하는 얘길 들었지만, 지금은 조용해.

TextEng: I have paid close attention to what has been said of the plague, but there is little real information. I don't know if I can help you.
Text: 역병 소식엔 귀를 기울여 왔지만, 실속 있는 정보는 드물더군. 자네에게 도움이 될지는 모르겠네.

TextEng: As you will. Try to speak a little faster, I don't have all day.
Text: 좋을 대로. 말은 좀 빠르게 하지. 내게도 시간은 소중하네.

TextEng: What do you want to know?
Text: 무얼 알고 싶은가?

TextEng: I pay no attention to the ramblings of the lower classes, and I assure you that Blacklake nobles do not spread rumors. I cannot help you.
Text: 하층민의 지껄임엔 귀 기울이지 않아. 검은호수의 귀족들이라면 소문을 퍼뜨리지도 않지. 도와줄 수 없다.

TextEng: Certainly not. The Blacklake maintains strict control on all animals. There is even a zoo, but there is hardly anything there I would call strange.
Text: 전혀. 검은호수는 동물 관리를 엄격히 한다. 동물원도 있긴 하지만, 별로 '이상하다' 할 만한 건 없지.

TextEng: I have no idea what you are looking for, or would consider "odd." The zoo's in the northeast if you want to see for yourself.
Text: 자네가 뭘 찾는지, '별난' 게 뭔지 난 모른다. 보고 싶으면 북동쪽에 있는 동물원으로 가 보게.

TextEng: Is there something else you need, then?
Text: 그럼 또 필요한 게 있나?

TextEng: I couldn't say. Lord Montgomery "Sureshot" is the proprietor. You will have to speak with him if you wish a definitive answer.
Text: 모르겠군. 몽고메리 경, '백발백중'이 그곳 주인이다. 확답이 필요하면 직접 물어보게.

TextEng: The zoo's in the northeast part of the district if you haven't already been.
Text: 동물원은 지구 북동쪽에 있다. 아직 안 가 봤다면 말이야.

TextEng: Why have you intruded? Get out! Out! Filthy evil beast!
Text: 왜 침입했지? 꺼져! 당장! 더러운 악귀 같으니!

TextEng: I don't welcome strangers in my estate!
Text: 내 저택에 뜨내기는 환영하지 않아!
